bondage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the state of having your freedom limited, or being prevented from doing what you want
bondage.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the state of being a slave
bondage.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Since the age of 13, he had been in bondage.
bondage.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the practice of being tied up for sexual pleasure
